meta.title: Create in Me a Clean Heart
meta.subtitle: Psalm 51:10-12
meta.comment:
Keith Green
(c)1984 For The Shepherd Music

lines.text: Create in me a clean heart, O God
And renew a right spirit within me
Create in me a clean heart, O God
And renew a right spirit within me
And take not Thy Holy Spirit from me
And renew a right spirit within me
